channel.title: ~~ Fawki's GuildMiner v 0.31~~
channel.description:
well here is fawki the ultimate SRL leaders script ...
{=========================================================================] [ SRL Guildminer 0.31. ] [ ] [ NAME : SRL Guildminer 0.31 ] [ WRITER : Stupid3ooo, heavy modded by WT-Fakawi ] [ CATEGORY : Miner ] [ DESCRIPTION : See below. ] [ USAGE : Miner/banker for coal ] [ AUTOCOLOR : YES ] [ SRL REV. : SRL Version 2.2 ] [ NOTES : STAND @ LEFTMOST BANKSLOT ] [ FACE MM PERFECT NORTH. ] [=========================================================================] | Description: | | A macro that mines a full load of coal and mith in the miner's guild, | | then banks it in the east Falador bank. | | | Instructions: | | 1.Set the Runescape brightness to V-bright, and your computer's | | resolution to 32bit resolution. | | 2.Need SCAR version 2.0.3. | | 3.Start script in the Falador eastern bank. | | 4.Start with a pickaxe in your fist inventory slot or equiped. | | 5.Recomended to have extra pickaxes in your first bank slot. | | 6.Click and drag the crosshair over the Runescape client. | Then press the green arrow. | | 7.START @ FALADOR EASTBANK LEFTMOST BANKSLOT FACE MM PERFECTLY NORTH | [=========================================================================}
All the credits for this goes to fawki i am just a person who is posting this. Link to download : = ( removed for now )

item.title: ~~ Fawki's GuildMiner v 0.31~~
item.dc:creator: @subin subin
item.description:
@subin wrote:

OH GOD THATS HOW I GOT HACKED !!!
lol… TY for letting me know but i am sure that i edited the password ans username part.
frostbyte100 you a very trustful person for letting me know.
The link is removed for now , i updated the attachment.
And i only lost 70k worth of items…

item.title: ~~ Fawki's GuildMiner v 0.31~~

item.description:

mod! admin! somebody remove the attachment and DL link quickly!

he meant that subinz left his username and password in it, I tried to change it so I could pm you the new pass, but it was already changed, I hope you did it and not anyone else :([/quote]

I tried to change it as well, but I was also to late.
